original_text: And with them, by their generations, after the house of their fathers, were bands of soldiers for war, six and thirty thousand men: for they had many wives and sons.
korean_text: 그들과 함께 있는 자는 그 계보와 종족대로 능히 출전할 만한 군대가 삼만 육천 명이니 이는 그 처자가 많기 때문이며

sentences.original_text: And with them, by their generations,
after the house of their fathers,
were bands of soldiers for war,
for they had many wives and sons.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 많은 아내와 아들을 두었기 때문이다.
